briefdescription.para: Color scheme is determined by the system color scheme.
Color scheme is determined by the light/dark system color scheme.

detaileddescription.para: Color scheme is determined by a custom color scheme

briefdescription.para: Color scheme modes.
Maps custom color scheme name to palette.
Construct manager with pointer to parent object.
Perform event manager startup initialization.
Get the current color scheme.
Set the color scheme mode to colorSchemeMode.
Get whether the system color scheme mode is active.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether the system color scheme mode is active

briefdescription.para: Get whether the system light/dark color scheme mode is active.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether the system light/dark color scheme mode is active

briefdescription.para: Get whether the light system color scheme is active.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether the light system color scheme is active (also false when the system theme is not active)

briefdescription.para: Get whether the dark system color scheme is active.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether the dark system color scheme is active (also false when the system theme is not active)

briefdescription.para: Get whether a custom color scheme mode is active.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether a custom color scheme mode is active

briefdescription.para: Set color scheme mode to system.
Set color scheme mode to system light/dark.
Set color scheme to system light (this will activate the system light/dark color scheme mode)
Set theme to system dark (this will activate the system light/dark color scheme mode)
Activates the currently selected custom color scheme.
Activate custom color scheme with customThemeName (this will override the system color scheme)
Get custom color scheme mode names for customColorSchemeModes.

simplesect.para: List of color scheme mode names for the custom color scheme modes

briefdescription.para: Get custom color schemes for customColorSchemeModes.
Add custom colorScheme.
Get custom color schemes list model.

simplesect.para: Reference to custom color schemes list model

briefdescription.para: Signals that the color scheme changed.
Signals that the color scheme mode changed to colorSchemeMode.
Restyles all widgets to implement a color scheme change.
Get custom color schemes list model.

simplesect.para: Reference to custom color schemes list model

briefdescription.para: Abstract theme manager class.

detaileddescription.para: This class provides an interface for the theme manager
